context.p: Component Documentation aims at providing maximum information about a component within the product. The aim of this document is for people to quickly understand the component and work in it. T24 Domains and products are a larger area for people to understand and get trained within a short span of time. If component level documents are available then it can help in people understanding specific component/s within the product and work in it.

T24 Component is a subset of a product and consists or supports functionality around the product. T24 components have been introduced in R09 and the components are used to create a map out of a product. The idea of splitting the product into components is more for Updates and also for an organizational approach. The organizational approach aims at framing an organization structure around components and to create an ownership at component level. The various metrics around Development organization are also being measured at a component level.
